about_the_game:
Behind Smith’s conventional appearance hides an unforgettable experience full of drifting and more torpedoes than you can count.

Key features:

  • High main battery firing rate

  • Rapid torpedo tube reload

  • Low ship speed

  • Short-range torpedoes.

This package includes:

  • Smith, American Tier II destroyer

  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.
detailed_description:
Behind Smith’s conventional appearance hides an unforgettable experience full of drifting and more torpedoes than you can count.

Key features:

  • Rapid torpedo tube reload

This package includes:

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created via Steam and will be invoiced on your Wargaming Account only once.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10

  • Storage: 43 GB available space

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

Users Interact
• User generated content shared with others
